Cart¶

class apps.cart.cart.Cart(request)¶

The cart as an object

add(product)¶

Update the cart if the user add a product

clear()¶

Clears the cart session

get_total_cost()¶

Receives the total cost of the product contained in the cart

Returns

The sum of the product’s prices

Return type

int

get_total_length()¶

Returns the total ammount of ordered products

Returns

The sum of the products that the customers have ordered

Return type

int

has_product(product_id)¶

Checks if the card have products

Parameters

product_id – A unique string id

:type product_id str :return: True if the cart is not empty, False if the cart is empty :rtype: bool

remove(product_id, quantity)¶

Decrements the quantity of the products according to quantity parameter

Parameters

product_id – The product that the user would like to remove

:type str :param quantity: The quantity of this specific product that they want to remove :type int

save()¶

Saves the carts session
